headline: Is Philip Morris International (PM) Still Attractive After Strong Multi Year Share Price Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Philip Morris International is still a buyable story at around US$177, the key question is how that price compares with what the business might be worth. The stock has recently pulled back by about 1.1% over the last week, after a stronger run with returns of 10.4% over the past month, 10.4% year to date and 40.5% over the last year, and longer term returns of 98.8% over three years and 163.3% over five years. Alongside this share price performance, investors...
